Plot: A wallet lost and found opens the door to romantic adventure for Georges and Marguerite. After examining the ID papers of its owner, it is not a simple matter for Georges to turn the red ...
Title: Wild Grass
Writer: Christian Gailly (novel), Alain Resnais (adaptation), Laurent Herbiet (adaptation)
Actors: Sabine Azéma, André Dussollier, Anne Consigny, Emmanuelle Devos
tomatoConsensus: Precious to a fault, Wild Grass finds 88-year-old director Alain Resnais as joyously unconstrained as ever.
